STAKE.TITLE: Stake
STAKE.DEFI_TEXT: Staking DeFi style will use your own wallet outside of the exchange. To start you are required to establish a connection, once connected you can stake and start earning directly from your wallet.
STAKE.PERIOD_SUBTITLE: Longer you stake the more you are rewarded. Select the duration of stake below.
STAKE.VARIABLE_TEXT: *{0} about how the variable rate works.
STAKE.REVIEW_NOTE: Duration is measured by the timing of the Ethereum blocks. Please check and confirm the details above before you stake as unstaking early will result in a percentage of your stakes principle to be deducted and earnings forfeited.
STAKE.WAITING_TEXT: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
STAKE.ERROR_SUBTITLE: If this was a mistake you can go back and retry
STAKE.COMPLETED_TOOLTIP: Stake is mature. Continue staking to earn more rewards or unstake to claim rewards.

INSTALL_METAMASK_DETAILS.TITLE: Install MetaMask

STAKE.EARN_REWARD: Earn rewards for staking your digital assets

2.TEXT: the highest bonus rewards on your earnings

UNSTAKE.TITLE: Unstake
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TITLE: Looks like you are trying to unstake early
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TEXT_1: This could lead to a percentage of your initial principle stake being deducted and all earnings being forfeited.
UNSTAKE.EARLY_WARNING_TEXT_2: Are you sure you want to proceed?
UNSTAKE.SLASH_FOOTNOTE: *All amounts slashed are distributed to remaining stakers. Please consider the slashed amount from initial principle, the earnings forfeited and duration remaining and determine if the value lost in unstaking early is worth the cost.
UNSTAKE.AMOUNT_NOTE: Amounts will be distributed to your wallet address
UNSTAKE.PENDING_EARNINGS_FOOTNOTE: *Pending earnings are amounts that have not cleared and require a blockchain transaction in order to be added to your total receiving amount.

CEFI_STAKE.INTRODUCTION_1: Earn rewards on assets you have stored in your local exchange wallet. Simply, click 'STAKE', input the amount you'd like to stake and start earning.
CEFI_STAKE.MONITOR_ACTIVE_STAKES: Monitor active stakes and their earnings coming from the staking pools.
CEFI_STAKE.USE_FILTERS_FOR_HISTORICAL_EVENTS: Use the filters to find all staking historical events. All earnings from completed stakes will be deposit to your wallet.
CEFI_STAKE.READ_BEFORE_AGREE_AND_EARN: Read Before You Agree and Earn
CEFI_STAKE.AGREEMENT_INTRODUCTION_1: Locking up funds and participating in staking can indeed be a profitable way to earn rewards. However, it is essential to be aware that there might be penalties for early unstaking and potentially long lock up periods. Therefore, it is crucial to thoroughly understand the pool's rules before staking. By clicking 'I agree and understand' below, you acknowledge that you will
CEFI_STAKE.AGREEMENT_INTRODUCTION_2: carefully read the terms in the steps to follow,
CEFI_STAKE.AGREEMENT_INTRODUCTION_3: and you accept the potential risks and penalties associated with early unstaking. Proceeding with this understanding will ensure a more informed and secure staking experience.
CEFI_STAKE.SLASHING_RULES_ENFORCED_LABEL: Slashing rules are enforced in this pool
CEFI_STAKE.SLASHING_RULES_NOTICE: Keep in mind that opting to withdraw your funds prior to the designated duration will incur a penalty, as outlined in the slashing rules mentioned above. Prior to committing to a staking period, it's crucial to assess your financial stability, as initiating an early unstaking process could lead to a decrease in the overall value of your initial stake.
CEFI_STAKE.UNSTAKE_ANYTIME_LABEL: This pool allows you to unstake at anytime without consequence.
CEFI_STAKE.FULL_DURATION_LOCK_LABEL: This pool locks you in for the full duration. Please consider your financial sustainability before committing to the staking pool as unstaking before the term will not be possible.
CEFI_STAKE.DISCLAIMER_NOTICE: Disclaimer: Please note that for amounts valued in USD exceeding $1,000 will require completing ID verification. This value is inclusive of earnings, and the platform reserves the right to request additional user information.
CEFI_STAKE.SETTLEMENT_NOTICE: {0} A 24h settlement period will be applied upon unstaking.
CEFI_STAKE.STAKE_RULES_NOTICE: As soon as you've staked you will be committed to the rules of the pool.
CEFI_STAKE.EARNINGS_START_NOTICE: Your stake will start earning rewards.
CEFI_STAKE.REVIEW_PROGRESS_LABEL: You can review the progress of your stake on the {0}
CEFI_STAKE.MINIMUM_AMOUNT_ALLOWED: Staking pool's minimum amount allowed is
CEFI_STAKE.MAXIMUM_AMOUNT_ALLOWED: Staking pool's maximum amount allowed is
CEFI_STAKE.TOOLTIP: The penalty you will incur if you unstake too early. {0}

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_ASSETS_TXT_1: Displayed is a summary of all your assets.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_ASSETS_TXT_2: Holding a large amounts of assets will entitle you for an account upgrade which includes a unique badge and lower trading fees.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_1: Your account type determines your account badge, trading fee, deposits and withdrawal limits.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_2: Your trading account age, activity level and total account assets amount will determine if your account is eligible for an upgrade.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_3: Maintaining your account level requires constant trading and maintaining a certain amount of deposited assets.
SUMMARY.ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TXT_4: Periodic downgrading of accounts will occur if activity and assets are not maintained.
SUMMARY.FEES_AND_LIMIT_TXT_1: Becoming a crypto trader marks new beginning. Armed with wits, will and speed only by taking risks and trading will you be allowed to update your account.
SUMMARY.FEES_AND_LIMIT_TXT_2: Each account has its own fees and deposit and withdrawal limits.
SUMMARY.INVITE_USER: Invite users and enjoy commissions from their trade

UNVERIFIED.TITLE: Complete verification
UNVERIFIED.TEXT: In order to make a {0} you are required to complete your verification which includes verification of your bank details. Please click the proceed button below.

REVIEW_DEPOSIT.TITLE: Check and confirm deposit details
REVIEW_DEPOSIT.SUBTITLE: Please check the deposit details below to make sure everything is correct.
REVIEW_DEPOSIT.NOTE: To avoid delays make sure that your deposit's amount, note and the transaction ID match with the details above. If issues shall arise please contact support.

DEPOSIT_FEE_NOTE: Note, the total amount deposited to your account will be the amount minus the deposit fee
AMOUNT_LABEL: Enter the amount deposited (must be identical to the actual amount)
TRANSACTION_ID_LABEL: Enter the transaction ID of the deposit
PENDING_DEPOSIT_TEXT_1: Your deposit is now in queue for verification and will remain in a pending state until cleared.
PENDING_DEPOSIT_TEXT_2: Typically deposits clear within 24h but can take up to 48h, after clearing your deposit amount minus the fee will be credited to your balance.
DEPOSIT_HOME_NOTE: To make a deposit please input the amount you will deposit from your own bank account. To avoid delays, make sure you the amount you enter below matches the actual amount that you will or have sent from your bank account.
DEPOSIT_TXID_NOTE: To avoid delays with your deposit please make sure to enter your unique note displayed above when making your bank deposit within the note or message of your transaction. Make sure the amount below matches what you actually deposit from you bank and that you include the transaction ID provided by your bank after the transaction has been made.
DEPOSIT_BANK_TEXT: Use the bank details below to make your deposit.
PENDING_WITHDRAWAL_TEXT_1: Your withdrawal is now in que for verification and will remain in a pending state until cleared.
DEPOSIT_AMOUNT_MIN_VALIDATION: The transaction is too small to send. Try a larger amount.
DEPOSIT_AMOUNT_MAX_VALIDATION: The transaction is too big to send. Try a smaller amount.
VERIFY_BANK_WITHDRAW: In order to make a withdrawal you are required to complete your verification which includes verification of your bank details. Please click the proceed button below.
WITHDRAW_NOTE: Please note: You can only withdraw to an account in your name.
QUOTE_CONFIRMATION_MSG_TEXT_1: Please check your order and confirm it below.
QUOTE_CONFIRMATION_MSG_TEXT_2: Amount to receive are estimates and aren't inclusive of the trading fee
QUOTE_CONFIRMATION_EXPIRED_MSG_TEXT_2: Go back to get a new price quote.

WITHDRAWALS_FORM_MAIL_INFO: Input a user's HollaEx account email that is on this exchange and transfer for free.

P2P.PAYMENT_METHODS_DEC: You can sell cryptocurrencies and receive fiat payments by adding your personal payment account details, such as bank information or other local payment methods. Ensure that the name associated with your payment account matches the name in your verified details before adding your payment information.
P2P.SELECT_PAYMENT_METHOD_AND_AMOUNT: please select payment method and input amount
P2P.TITLE: P2P Deals
P2P.DESCRIPTION: P2P deals for buying and selling Bitcoin, USDT, and other cryptocurrencies.
P2P.ENTER_REASON: Enter the reason why you are appealing this transaction
P2P.APPEALED_TRANSACTION: You have appealed the transaction, contact support to resolve your issue
P2P.PAYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS: Here's the selected payment method, transfer money to seller. After you've successfully transferred the money please click confirm below to notify the seller
P2P.PAYMENT_ACCOUNT: Below is the payment account and method that is shared with the buyer.
P2P.EXPECTED_TIME: Expected time until funds are release: 30 minutes
P2P.PAYMENT_TIME: Please make the payment in the time provided above.
P2P.ORDER_CANCELLED: The order will otherwise be cancelled
P2P.AUTO_RESPONSE_LIMIT: Auto response text must be no longer than 240 characters
P2P.TERMS_RESPONSE_LIMIT: Terms must be no longer than 240 characters
P2P.FUNDS_CREDITED: Once funds are released you will find the funds credited to your funding wallet
P2P.VENDOR_CANCELLED: Vendor cancelled the order, there will not be transfer of funds, If you think this is an error, Please contact support
P2P.FUNDS_TRANSFERRED: Vendor confirmed the transaction and funds have been transferred to your balance.
P2P.VENDOR_APPEALED: Transaction appealed by the vendor, Please contact support with transaction id to resolve the issue
P2P.USER_APPEALED: You appealed the transaction, Please contact support with transaction id to resolve the issue
P2P.ORDER_COMPLETE_VENDOR: You've marked this order as complete and released the funds
P2P.PAYMENT_NOT_SENT: The buyer has not sent the payment yet. Once you receive payment you will be notified here.
P2P.CONFIRM_AND_RELEASE: Please kindly confirm and release crypto funds to buyer below once complete
P2P.CHECK_AND_RELEASE: Please check that the payment from the buyer was sent and confirm and release funds below.
P2P.CONFIRM_PAYMENT_VENDOR: Please communicate with the buyer to confirm this transaction.
P2P.ORDER_INITIATED: You've initiated and created an order with
P2P.CONFIRM_PAYMENT: Please communicate with the vendor to confirm your incoming payment.
P2P.BUYER_PAID_ORDER: Buyer has marked this order as paid. Waiting for vendor to check, confirm and release funds.
P2P.BUYER_SENT_FUNDS: Youâ€™ve signaled to the merchant that youâ€™ve sent the funds. Please wait for a response from the vendor merchant.
P2P.ORDER_EXPIRED: This order expired due to inactivity in the given time.
P2P.BUYER_CANCELLED_ORDER: Buyer has cancelled this order, Transaction is closed.
P2P.BUYER_APPEALED_ORDER: Buyer has appealed this order, Please contact support to resolve the issue.
P2P.VENDOR_CONFIRMED_ORDER: Vendor confirmed the transaction and released the funds.
P2P.ORDER_CLOSED: The order has been closed after reaching a verdict on the appeal request.
P2P.VENDOR_CANCELLED_ORDER: Vendor has cancelled this order, Transaction is closed.
P2P.VENDOR_APPEALED_ORDER: Vendor has appealed this order, Please contact support to resolve the issue.
P2P.SET_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_METHODS: Set the total amount and payment methods
P2P.SET_TERMS_RESPONSE: Set terms and an automated response
P2P.FIAT_CURRENCY_WANT_TO_RECEIVE: Fiat currency you want to receive
P2P.PRICE_PROFIT_SPREAD_SET: Price and profit spread to set
P2P.SELECT_REGION: Select your region under which your deal will be listed
P2P.TERMS_CONDITIONS_DEAL: Terms and conditions for this deal
P2P.CHAT_RESPONSE: Chat response that your counterpart will see upon entering the P2P deal room
P2P.STEP_SET_TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAYMENT_METHODS: Set the total amount and payment methods
P2P.STEP_SET_TERMS_AUTO_RESPONSE: Set terms and an automated response
P2P.CANCEL_WARNING: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
P2P.CONFIRM_WARNING: Are you sure to confirm this order?
P2P.RELEASE_WARNING: Are you sure to release this order?
P2P.AMOUNT_SEND_RELEASE: (Amount of crypto you'll sell and release)
P2P.BUYER_NOT_MADE_THE_PAYMENT: The buyer has not confirmed their payment yet.
P2P.NEW_MESSAGE:: You have a new message for your order
P2P.STATUS_UPDATE: You have an update on your order
P2P.PAYMENT_FIELD_INFO: This new payment field is additional and should assist P2P participants in their fiat currency transfers. This should be account details related to payment method. This may including phone numbers, usernames, unique account numbers, and other necessary information for transactions depending on the payment methods system.
P2P.CREATE_NEW_PAYMENT_METHODS: Create and add new payment methods
P2P.MANUAL_PAYMENT_METHOD_ENTRY: To add a payment method to your P2P platform, you can do so manually by entering the name of the payment method and the required payment details. For example, PayPal uses email addresses to send and receive funds.
P2P.USERS_PAYMENT_SELECTION: Once the payment method is added, your P2P merchants and users will be able to select it and enter the necessary information when making or receiving payments. The details they provide will be shared with the other party in the P2P transaction.
P2P.METHOD_NAME_AND_DETAIL: Name of method and main payment detail
P2P.PAYMENT_METHOD_CREATED: Payment method created! Waiting for verification by admin
